description:
A do-it-all board ready to tackle everything from flatwater to fitness to surfing and SUP yoga. The stable design suits beginners on calm water or more experienced paddlers venturing into surfier conditions. It tracks superbly, letting you develop skills and efficient strokes on either side.

  • Multilayer epoxy and glass construction ensures durability and keeps it looking beautiful
  • Clear coat finish uses tri-layer fibreglass epoxy resin
  • Lightweight EPS foam core with 5-layer reinforced sidewalls
  • Deck pad makes touring days a little more comfortable
  • Ergonomic carry handle makes the car-to-beach transition easier
  • Comes with a stabilizer fin with a large surface area to increase lateral stability. and enhance straight tracking
  • Includes fin screw, fin plate and fin key
name: Level Six Ten Six Cruising SUP - Unisex
